message.content:
cs.PL, cs.CR, cs.LO, cs.SE, cs.FL 

This paper deals with information-flow security type systems, which are typically studied in the programming languages (cs.PL) and computer security (cs.CR) sub-categories. The paper also introduces a new approach to expressing declassification policies using existential types, which is a type system concept that is often studied in the logic (cs.LO) and software engineering (cs.SE) sub-categories. Finally, the paper formalizes its approach in a functional calculus, which is a topic that falls under the formal languages and automata theory (cs.FL) sub-category.
